name: Utopia
description: A digital paradise designed to reward every step of your journey. Here, community and technology converge to foster freedom, creativity, and tangible value.At the heart of Utopia is a living world where your engagement fuels the economy. Guide the Utopia girl closer to our world's core and watch your influence—and your BNB rewards—grow. We believe in a future where exploration is directly linked to prosperity.The path is yours to shape, and every discovery brings you closer to the center of it all.
